resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>6bee6e3a-0489-4171-8c22-9e96cfc7fcb3#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hammurapi fej, Kr. e. 18. század, Musée du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="en">Hammurapi head, 18th century BC, Musée du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hammurapi Kopf, 18. Jahrhundert BC, Musée du 
Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tête de Hammurapi, 18ème siècle BC, Musée du 
Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cabeça de Hammurapi, 18o século BC, Musée du 
Grelha.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Testa di Hammurapi, diciottesimo secolo BC, Musée
du Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλι Hammurapi, 18$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., Musιe du 
Louvre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pista de Hammurapi, décimo octavo siglo A.C., 
Musée du Louvre.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Hammurapi fej néven közismert Szászában talált dioritfej, amely Hammurapit vagy a korszak más jelentős királyát ábrázolja.</string>
            <string language="en">This diorite head discovered in Sasa is well-known as Hammurapi head, which represents Hammurapi or another great king of the period.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókori Kelet,   Mezopotámia,   Kr. e. 18. század,   babiloni,   óbabiloni,   király,   szobor,   szobrászat,   Hammurapi,  ,  </string>
            <string language="en">ancient east, Mesopotamia, 18th century BC, Babylonian, Old Babylonian, king, statue, statuary, Hammurapi, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser diorite Kopf, der in Sasa entdeckt wird, ist als 
Hammurapi Kopf weithin bekannt, der Hammurapi oder einen anderen 
großen König der Periode darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette tête de diorite découverte dans Sasa est bien 
connue comme tête de Hammurapi, qui représente un Hammurapi ou un 
grand roi différent de la période.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta cabeça do diorite descoberta em Sasa é well-known 
como a cabeça de Hammurapi, que representa Hammurapi ou um outro rei 
grande do período.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa testa del diorite scoperta in Sasa è ben nota come
testa di Hammurapi, che rappresenta Hammurapi o un altro re grande del
periodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το κεφάλι διοριτών που ανακαλύπτεται σε Sasa 
είναι γνωστό ως κεφάλι Hammurapi, το οποίο αντιπροσωπεύει 
Hammurapi ή έναν άλλο μεγάλο βασιλιά της περιόδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta pista del diorite descubierta en Sasa es bien sabido 
como pista de Hammurapi, que representa a Hammurapi o a otro gran rey 
del período.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alter Osten, Mesopotamia, 18. Jahrhundert BC, Babylonian, alter 
Babylonian, König, Statue, statuary, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est antique, Mesopotamia, 18ème siècle BC, Babylonien, vieux 
Babylonien, roi, statue, statuaire, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leste antigo, Mesopotamia, 18o século BC, babylonian, 
babylonian velho, rei, estátua, statuary, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">est antico, Mesopotamia, diciottesimo secolo BC, babylonian, 
babylonian anziano, re, statua, statuaria, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαία ανατολή, Μεσοποταμία, 18$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., 
Babylonian, παλαιό Babylonian, βασιλιάς, άγαλμα, 
αγαλματώδες, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">este antiguo, Mesopotamia, décimo octavo siglo A.C., 
babilónico, viejo babilónico, rey, estatua, statuary, Hammurapi,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
